coded_answer.p: I am writing to you because of the unpleasentunpleasant evening I have spenthad recently.

I havehad always thought that the plays of the Circle Theatre are worth of seeing, but two days beforeago I was very disappointed after visiting yoursyour theatre. EalyerEarlier I had seen an advertisement for the show but the informationesinformation on it causedwas falsfalse.

First of all, I have not seendid not see my favourite actor, Danny Brook. The second thinkthing is that the play did not start at 19:30 but at 20:15! I could not get a discount. The last thinkthing is that it was unpossibleimpossible to getgo to the theatre restaurant because it was closed. I was told that it had been painted but nobody had written itthat on anthe advertisement.
At the endFinally, I would like to say that my evening out two days beforeago was not perfect and I woldwould be glad if you could paygive my some money backgive some of my money back.
Modern technology is changing the world every day. I would like to write about how it has influentedinfluenced my daily life.

I am a student ofat a technical univercityuniversity. Some time beforeago I did not know anything about the internetInternet. When I neadedneeded some informationesinformation I had to go to the liblarylibrary to find it in books or newspapers. Now the only thinkthing I have to do is to go to the computer room and turn on the computer. The computer is helpfullhelpful when I want to contact somebody very fast. I just send an e-mail and that is all!
The second thinkthing is that when I neadedneeded a phone card to call somebody I had to staystand in a long queue. Now I just only put some money into a machine and I can take the card from there!
The last example is that I have in my house a lot of modern equipmenta lot of modern equipment in my house, like a TV set, fridge orand microwavesmicrowave which help me forin my livinglife.
It is obvious that modern technology has changed my daily life.
